auth-username.description: Specify the Username Field in the Client Certificate(If multi-fields are specificed, prior one has higher priority)

client-ocsp.description: Specify ocsp authentication server(s) for client certificate verification

cipher.description: SSL cipher suites and all by default

ocspst-srvr-period.description: Specify certificate status update period (Default is 1 hour)

ocspst-sg-period.description: Specify certificate status update period (Default is 1 hour)

client-certificate.description: 'Ignore': "Don't request client certificate;'Require': "Require client certificate;'Request': "Request client certificate;

client-certificate-Request-CA.description: Send CA lists in certificate request (CA Certificate Name)

close-notify.description: Send close notification when terminate connection

crl.description: Certificate Revocation Lists (Certificate Revocation Lists file name)

forward-proxy-ca-cert.description: CA Certificate for forward proxy (SSL forward proxy CA Certificate Name)

forward-proxy-ca-key.description: CA Private Key for forward proxy (SSL forward proxy CA Key Name)

forward-encrypted.description: Do NOT use this option manually. (This is an A10 reserved keyword.) (The ENCRYPTED password string)

forward-proxy-alt-sign.description: Forward proxy alternate signing cert and key

fp-alt-cert.description: CA Certificate for forward proxy alternate signing (Certificate name)

fp-alt-key.description: CA Private Key for forward proxy alternate signing (Key name)

fp-alt-encrypted.description: Do NOT use this option manually. (This is an A10 reserved keyword.) (The ENCRYPTED password string)

forward-proxy-trusted-ca-lists.description: Forward proxy trusted CA list files

forward-proxy-trusted-ca.description: Forward proxy trusted CA file (CA file name)

forward-proxy-verify-cert-fail-action.description: Action taken if certificate verification fails, close the connection by default

verify-cert-fail-action.description: 'bypass': "bypass SSLi processing;'continue': "continue the connection;'drop': "close the connection;

forward-proxy-cert-revoke-action.description: Action taken if a certificate is irreversibly revoked, bypass SSLi processing by default

cert-revoke-action.description: 'bypass': "bypass SSLi processing;'continue': "continue the connection;'drop': "close the connection;

forward-proxy-cert-unknown-action.description: Action taken if a certificate revocation status is unknown, bypass SSLi processing by default

cert-unknown-action.description: 'bypass': "bypass SSLi processing;'continue': "continue the connection;'drop': "close the connection;

forward-proxy-cache-persistence.description: Configure class-list for SSLi cache persistence

cache-persistence-list.description: Do persistence hash on certificates that match this class-list

forward-proxy-cert-ext.description: Extensions to add to forward proxy certificates

forward-proxy-cert-validity.description: Set the validity period for forward proxy certificates

forward-proxy-hash-persistence-interval.description: Set the time interval to save the hash persistence certs (Interval value, in minutes)

forward-proxy-ssl-version.description: TLS/SSL version, default is TLS1.2 (TLS/SSL version: 31-TLSv1.0, 32-TLSv1.1 and 33-TLSv1.2)

forward-proxy-crl-disable.description: Disable Certificate Revocation List checking for forward proxy

forward-proxy-cert-cache-timeout.description: Certificate cache timeout, default is 1 hour (seconds, set to 0 for never timeout)

forward-proxy-cert-cache-limit.description: Certificate cache size limit, default is 524288 (set to 0 for unlimited size)

forward-proxy-cert-expiry.description: Adjust certificate expiry relative to the time when it is created on the device

forward-proxy-selfsign-redir.description: Redirect connections to pages with self signed certs to a warning page

forward-proxy-failsafe-disable.description: Disable Failsafe for SSL forward proxy

forward-proxy-source-nat.description: Source NAT to fetch server certificate

fp-cert-fetch-natpool-name.description: Specify NAT pool or pool group (NAT Pool or Pool Group)

enumMap.auto: "Configure auto NAT for server certificate fetching

fp-cert-fetch-autonat.description: 'auto': "Configure auto NAT for server certificate fetching;

class-list.description: Forward proxy bypass if SNI string matches class-list

inspect-list.description: Forward proxy Inspect if SNI string matches class-list

client-auth.description: Bypass SSL forward proxy client authentication

contains.description: Forward proxy bypass if SNI string contains another string (SNI String)

ends-with.description: Forward proxy bypass if SNI string ends with another string (SNI String)

equals.description: Forward proxy bypass if SNI string equals another string (SNI String)

starts-with.description: Forward proxy bypass if SNI string starts with another string (SNI String)

client-auth-case-insensitive.description: Case insensitive forward proxy client auth bypass

client-auth-class-list.description: Forward proxy client auth bypass if SNI string matches class-list (Class List Name)

client-auth-contains.description: Forward proxy bypass if SNI string contains another string (SNI String)

client-auth-ends-with.description: Forward proxy bypass if SNI string ends with another string (SNI String)

client-auth-equals.description: Forward proxy bypass if SNI string equals another string (SNI String)

client-auth-starts-with.description: Forward proxy bypass if SNI string starts with another string (SNI String)

key-encrypted.description: Do NOT use this option manually. (This is an A10 reserved keyword.) (The ENCRYPTED password string)

server-name.description: Server name indication in Client hello extension (Server name String)

server-cert.description: Server Certificate associated to SNI (Server Certificate Name)

server-key.description: Server Private Key associated to SNI (Server Private Key Name)

server-encrypted.description: Do NOT use this option manually. (This is an A10 reserved keyword.) (The ENCRYPTED password string)

server-name-regex.description: Server name indication in Client hello extension with regular expression (Server name String with regex)

server-cert-regex.description: Server Certificate associated to SNI regex (Server Certificate Name)

server-key-regex.description: Server Private Key associated to SNI regex (Server Private Key Name)

server-encrypted-regex.description: Do NOT use this option manually. (This is an A10 reserved keyword.) (The ENCRYPTED password string)

session-cache-size.description: Session Cache Size (Specify 0 to disable Session ID reuse.)

session-cache-timeout.description: Session Cache Timeout (Timeout value, in seconds)

session-ticket-lifetime.description: Session ticket lieftime in seconds from stateless session resumption (Lifetime value in seconds)

disable-sslv3.description: Reject Client requests for SSL version 3

sslv2-bypass-service-group.description: Service Group for Bypass SSLV2 (Service Group Name)

authorization.description: Specify LDAP server for client SSL authorizaiton

ldap-base-dn-from-cert.description: Use Subject DN as LDAP search base DN

auth-sg-dn.description: Use Subject DN as LDAP search base DN

auth-username-attribute.description: Specify attribute name of username for client SSL authorization (Specify attribute name)

non-ssl-bypass-service-group.description: Service Group for Bypass non-ssl traffic (Service Group Name)
